CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 12, 1957, page A15, reads: "'They're Marvelous...' - Three fabulous Pittsburghers swayed to the fashion tune in this scene featuring velvet lounging pajamas and a silk housecoat, worn respectively by, left, Elaine Jones, Gay DeHall and Hilda Logan. They were knockouts."
TitMainTitle: Three women, Elaine Jones, Gay DeHall, and Hilda Logan, modeling an evening dress, jumpsuit, and day dress with butterflies, in interior with marble paneling and terrazzo checkered floor for the National Council of Negro Women fashion show
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Clothing and dress--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Jones, Elaine.DeHall, Gay.Logan, Hilda.National Council of Negro Women.Models (Persons)--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Fashion models--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
